description: This is a complete package. But it is a beta version file.
The project are saved but once it is reloaded from a restart everything is gone no saved project as if it just went poof in to thin air please fix

The Fedora repo's edition seems to be up to date.
It simulates things nicely and looks good, but every time I add a new part it lags uncontrolably, not sure if this is a Wayland bug or not but I hope it gets fixed.
summary: Looks good, lags out too much

description:
Fritzing is amazing and among the best FOSS softwares ever. Please consider donating and contributing if you make value from it (I am not affiliated). On Fedora I recommend installing the RPM rather than the Flathub version. With the latter I had troubles saving the sketches: it would only create binaries which I was not able to open again.

What I like most is the combination of breadboard, schematic and PCB view all in one tool. Also, all electronics parts are available as Fritzing part online and I have never had limitations using Fritzing so far. It is a convenient all-in-one solution to the degree it makes sense.

I have not tried the circuit-simulator yet.

Don't expect too much of the autorouting function. It does not work for most of my circuits, but I have to say they are much more complicated than the examples and tutorials I find on the web.
summary: Amazing, tons of functions, endleess possibilities, FOSS

description: The version in the repository is YEARS old. The newest version costs $$ and is only available on their website. So unless you are a software developer, or want to pay for it...skip.
summary: Very outdated--not updatable to newest version

description: Buggy older version. Even though the sw lic. requires it to be free, they charge for the compiled version so the only way to actually get it free is to download the new source files/code and compile it yourself.
Good for anyone who does light development.
wrong setted user rights keeps fritzing away from running
Das Programm ist super um Schaltpläne zu entwerfen. Auch die verschiedenen Ansichten der Schaltung sind schön.
No se pueden hacer proyectos porque ha desaparecido el apartado de componentes.
Наглядно и удобно работать. Ничего не зависло
summary: Отличное приложение для прстого прототипирования электроники
